title: UI-safe artifact schema v1
description: Contract for artifacts safe to consume by UI/dashboard. Must NOT contain raw job description text (jd_text, description, description_text, descriptionHtml), secrets, or API keys. See docs/ARTIFACT_MODEL.md.

ui_safe_artifact_schema_version.description: Schema version for UI-safe artifact contract.

artifact_type.description: Identifies this as a UI-safe artifact.

jobs.description: Job entries. Each item must NOT contain prohibited fields (jd_text, description, description_text, descriptionHtml). Validation enforced by tests.

items.description: UI-safe job item. Prohibited: jd_text, description, description_text, descriptionHtml, job_description.
